thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I am new to Topcashback. I was hesitant to sign up because I had tried other similar sites that ended up being more of a hassle than anything else. I saw an offer for a free Lego kit - and have 2 nephews who LOVE Legos - so thought I'd give it a try. I have been pleasantly surprised! Everything flowed as it was supposed to! I didn't have to make any calls, or have any "technical issues", or have to waste my time trying to figure out how to get my payout. Now that I see it works smoothly I will start taking advantage of all the other great offers and cash back opportunities! So glad I gave this a try! I recommended Topcashback to my sister and she loves it too!
